summary: This is a re-upload of my CGI series of Far Off ENB. It attempts to make Skyrim look more like a CGI movie scene. Characters especially pop out with this config.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#00ff00][size=4][center]For the darker nights version of this mod, please visit my blog.
All updates will be posted on my blog going forward. Thank you for your continued support and enthusiasm!

[url=http://faroffmods.blogspot.com/]faroffmods[/url][/center][/size][/color][/b][/center]

[b][center]Please give each config a try and see which one you prefer most. Don't forget to look through the images section. :)

No lighting mods were used when making this ENB therefore, I cannot recommend them. Try them at your own risk.[/center][/b]
[center][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2878/12331950675_3881fbf4f3_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]3LqKNqZnXk8[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5495/12333176765_54b8cdd086_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]fuG9a_30Tfo[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7354/12332517903_3c0abc0ccb_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]GsthstsOPoY[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7320/12333451943_f4a896a29b_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]wfUmXuPL8JI[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5498/12332984865_46a1973eaa_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]Q_AE0c-b0BE[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3680/12332616323_5f276a09fe_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]ll-C8dGg330[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3670/12333948484_092b1595c5_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7356/12332617385_121894e1fa_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]TyMYU2N-NNY[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3716/12334136674_ff4a16d21e_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3744/12332749435_75511679fe_o.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]fmJpP2GWbyY[/youtube][/center]

This is a re-upload of my CGI series of Far Off ENB. It attempts to make Skyrim look more like a CGI movie scene. I've uploaded many screenshots. They start with v2.8 and end with v3.2.5. Have fun trying them all out :) I may update these to the latest ENB binary depending if I have the time and if I draw a good amount of endorsements.

[color=#008000][b]REQUIRED:[/b][/color]
=============
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?6gy5cpg1vd0aqxp]ENB Binary v0.155[/url][b](You only need the d3d9.dll file)[/b]
(I will try to update the binary to the latest ENB version soon.)


[color=#008000][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/color]
=============
0.As with all ENB configurations. BE SURE TO CHANGE [color=#008000][b]bFloatPointRendertarget=1 [/b][/color] in your skyrimprefs.ini file.

1. DELETE any leftover, like the EFFECT.TXT file located in skyrim folder if you are coming from a different ENB config.. Disable any other Grapical mod: CoT, RLFX, etc. this config is meant to be used with Vanilla game, nothing more is supported at this time. However, feel free to experiment.

2. Copy all the files to your Skyrim directory (where TESV.exe is located), click yes if asked to overwrite. Don't forget to put the ENB binary file here as well.


[color=#008000][b]TIPS AND TWEAKS:[/b][/color]
=============
Please visit my blog for detailed instructions and helpful tips to get your game looking like mine :)
This includes mods used for the look shown in my screenshots.
[url=http://faroffmods.blogspot.com/]Far Off Mods[/url]

Check out my other ENB presets here on Nexus:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56727/?]Far Off ENB - Nirn - For COT and ELFX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50500/?]Far Off ENB - The Pacific Northwest[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48144//]Far Off ENB - Claymay[/url][/url]
